aboutTheSpace.The space: Located in the heart of koregaon park. The room is very airy and suits the comfort needs of guests coming for leasure of all age groups. The terrace consists of an outdoor seating area, garden, equipped kitchenette and open air jacuzzi. The room consists of a kingsize bed, television, refrigerator and a wardrobe.
aboutTheSpace.Guest access: The whole floor is theirs which includes the private room with attached bathroom, terrace and the outdoor seating area.
aboutTheSpace.Other things to note: Keys of the room can be collected from the security guy. Strictly no smoking in the room. No visiting guests will be allowed in our apartment.

Bedroom and laundry.Essentials: Towels, bed sheets, soap and toilet paper

Internet and office.Dedicated workspace: Guests have a desk or table that’s used just for working, along with a comfortable chair.

Kitchen and dining.Kitchen: Space where guests can cook their own meals
Kitchen and dining.Cooking basics: Pots and pans, oil, salt and pepper

Outdoor.Private backyard – Not fully fenced: An open space on the property usually covered in grass

Parking and facilities.Lift: The home or building has a lift that’s at least 52 inches (132cm) deep and a doorway at least 32 inches (81cm) wide.

Services.Luggage drop-off allowed: For guests' convenience when they are arriving early or departing late
Services.Building staff: Someone is available 24 hours a day to let guests in

Not included.Smoke alarm: There is no smoke alarm on the property.
Not included.Carbon monoxide alarm: Host has indicated that no carbon monoxide detector is necessary. Contact the host with any questions.

Bedroom and laundry.Essentials: Towels, bed sheets, soap and toilet paper

Internet and office.Dedicated workspace: Guests have a desk or table that’s used just for working, along with a comfortable chair.

Kitchen and dining.Kitchen: Space where guests can cook their own meals
Kitchen and dining.Cooking basics: Pots and pans, oil, salt and pepper

Outdoor.Private backyard – Not fully fenced: An open space on the property usually covered in grass

Parking and facilities.Lift: The home or building has a lift that’s at least 52 inches (132cm) deep and a doorway at least 32 inches (81cm) wide.

Services.Luggage drop-off allowed: For guests' convenience when they are arriving early or departing late
Services.Building staff: Someone is available 24 hours a day to let guests in

Not included.Smoke alarm: There is no smoke alarm on the property.
Not included.Carbon monoxide alarm: Host has indicated that no carbon monoxide detector is necessary. Contact the host with any questions.
